definition: living in a particular place, a physician (especially an intern) who lives in a hospital and cares for hospitalized patients under the supervision of the medical staff of the hospital
details:
adjective
- living in a particular place
= example: living in a particular place
- used of animals that do not migrate
= synonyms: nonmigratory
noun
- a physician (especially an intern) who lives in a hospital and cares for hospitalized patients under the supervision of the medical staff of the hospital
= example: a physician (especially an intern) who lives in a hospital and cares for hospitalized patients under the supervision of the medical staff of the hospital
= synonyms: house physician, resident physician
- someone who lives at a particular place for a prolonged period or who was born there
= synonyms: occupier, occupant
